title: Smug — Sans ID
content:
Hello,

I'm looking for this font used in Smug Magazine. Thanks in advance!

[https://multiplefashiondisorder.files.wordpress.com/2011/01/naty-chabane...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317091108/https:/multiplefashiondisorder.files.wordpress.com/2011/01/naty-chabanenko-by-robert-hamada-for-smug-magazine-issue-no-3-01.jpg "https://multiplefashiondisorder.files.wordpress.com/2011/01/naty-chabanenko-by-robert-hamada-for-smug-magazine-issue-no-3-01.jpg")
author: davidgtz

comments.content:
ID requests should be posted on [The Type ID](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317091108/http:/typophile.com/typeid) board.

- Lex
